analysis.key_quote: I oppose any changes that go against the “Pendleton Civil Service Reform Act” which created the merit system, and 5 U.S.C. 2302 (b) (8) which makes federal employment decisions free from political influence.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes changes that undermine the merit system and emphasizes the importance of keeping federal employment decisions free from political influence, which aligns with concerns about politicization and the integrity of the civil service.
